title: Amazon Linux 2023 - ALAS2023-2025-1271: Important priority package update for amazon-ecr-credential-helper
description:
Package updates are available for Amazon Linux 2023 that fix the following vulnerabilities:
CVE-2025-58188:
	crypto/x509: panic when validating certificates with DSA public keys

Validating certificate chains which contain DSA public keys can cause programs
to panic, due to a interface cast that assumes they implement the Equal method.

This affects programs which validate arbitrary certificate chains.
